snippet.title: Go Go Thomas! App | Apps | Thomas & Friends
snippet.description:
Budge Studios presents Thomas & Friends: Go Go Thomas! - a fun speed game for kids. Race against other engines or select two trains to race against a friend! Use speed boosters to help you chug your fastest, and complete your trophy for a special special delivery. Full steam ahead! Buy Go Go Thomas! and see more Thomas apps on the App Store here: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id943432325 

FEATURES:
• Race as Thomas, Percy, James, Emily, James or Toby against other engines 
• Play in either “1 Player” or “2 Player” mode to challenge a friend! 
• Tap the green button as fast as you can to get chugging 
• Use speed boosters to puff even faster – a unique one for each engine! 
• “Easy” and “Hard” difficulty levels for kids of all ages 
• Speed through different 3-D settings, from the Countryside to the Castle 
• Unlock a new trophy piece with each win • Slide all of the pieces together to complete your trophy and get the special

Subscribe to Thomas & Friends on YouTube: http://po.st/ThomasSub

About Thomas & Friends:
Based on a series of children's books, "Thomas & Friends" features Thomas the Tank Engine adventures with other locomotives on the island of Sodor. Thomas often gets into trouble, but never gives up on trying to be a really useful engine. Other members of Sir Topham Hatt's Railway include: Percy (Thomas' best friend), and Gordon (the fastest and most powerful member of the team).

Connect with Thomas & Friends Online:
Visit the Thomas and Friends WEBSITE: http://po.st/ThomasWebsite
Like Thomas and Friends on FACEBOOK:  http://po.st/Thomas_FB
Follow Thomas and Friends on TWITTER: http://po.st/Thomas_Twitter
Follow Thomas and Friends on INSTAGRAM: http://po.st/Thomas_Instagram
Follow Thomas and Friends on PINTEREST: http://po.st/Thomas_Pinterest

Looking for even more safe, fun, kid friendly activities and apps? Head over to http://po.st/ThomasWebsite and shop for Thomas & Friends engines, games, and other products at http://po.st/ShopTF

Go Go Thomas! App | Apps | Thomas & Friends
